meanings.definition: Having a dark or dusky complexion.
meanings.sent1: The man with a swarthily skin tone stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: Her swarthily complexion made her look unique and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The swarthily face in the painting seemed to blend into the shadows.
meanings.sent4: The old castle was surrounded by swarthily figures in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The swarthily features of the mysterious stranger left an impression on me.

meanings.definition: In a dark or dusky manner.
meanings.sent1: The room was lit swarthily by a single candle.
meanings.sent2: She moved swarthily through the dimly lit alley.
meanings.sent3: The cat crept swarthily along the fence, trying to catch a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The fog rolled in swarthily, enveloping the town in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The music played swarthily in the background, creating a haunting atmosphere.
